data.title: Redins Antikvariat
data.text: Adams, Ansel (photo) The Four Seasons in Yosemite National Park.. A Photographic Story of Yosemite's Spectacular Scenery. Edited by Stanley Plumb. Los Angeles 1936. 54 leaves. 21.5 × 30.5 cm. Original printed wrappers. 2 leaves with small tears (1 and 2 cms) in margins, otherwise a very fine copy. First edition. (#154281)1000:- Addison, Joseph The Works of the Late Right Honourable Joseph Addison Esq;. In four volumes. The second edition: With a complete index. London, Jacob Tonson 1730. (2,xxi,(5),7-537,(1),(4) + (8),538,(12) + 579,(13) + 555,(13) pages. 4:o. Contemporary slightly worn half leather. 4 volumes. (#190996)2500:- (bild) Almeida, Teodoro de, El Hombre Feliz, independiente del Mundo y de la Fortuna, ó Arte de vivir contento en qualesquier trabajos de la vida I-III. Corregida y aumentada con Notas y Estampas por el Padre Don Teodoro de Almeyda. Traducida y exornada con un Compendio histórico, un Mapa geográfico y otras Notas por el Doctor Don Benito Estaun de Riol. Segunda edicion, Madrid, La Imprenta Real 1790. CXII,384,pages + 9 plates ; 400 pages + 9 plates (2), 416 pages + 8 plates and one folding map.3 contemporary full leather bindings. 3 volumes. (#196793)1000:- A Purveyance of the Royal Household in the Elizabethan Age.. A Perfect Booke, of all the landes as well arable as pasture, ... within the Hundreds of Evenger, Chutlye, Kingsclere, Pastroe, and Overton ... 1575, ... Now first published from the original MS. in the Wood Library, Whitchurch, ... with the introduction and notes by Walter Money. Newbury 1901. viii,136 pages + map and errata slip. Original cloth. Foxed. (#171924)1000:- Barbier, A.-A. & Dessessarts, N.L.M. Nouvelle bibliothèque d'un homme de goût, entièrement refondue, corrigée et augmentée, Contenant des jugements tirés des journaux les plus connus et des critiques les plus estimés, sur les meilleurs ouvrages qui ont paru dans tous les genres, tant en France que chez l'étranger jusqu'à ce jour. I-V.. Paris 1808-10. (4),xviii,461 + (4),523 + (4),457 + (4),498 + (4),467 pages. 8:vo. Contemporary full leather, worn at foot and head of spines. 5 volumes. A few small brown spots in volume 4, otherwise interior clean. (#215231)1200:- (bild) [Boutet, Claude] L'école de la mignature, ou l'art d'apprendre a peindre sans maitre.. Et les secrets pour faire les plus belles couleures. Nouvelle édition, revue, corrigée & augmentée. Paris J.B.G. Musier 1782. (2)vi,(8),178,(2), Uncut in original wrappers. Front wrapper and first 8 leaves torn without loss of paper or text. Spine very worn. (#179099)350:- Buchan, William Domestic Medicine:. or, A Treatise on the Prevention and Cure of Diseases by Regimen and Simple Medicines. With an Appendix, containing a Dispensatory for the Use of Private Practitioners. The thirteenth edition. London 1792. xxxvi, 712, (36) pages. Bound in full calf, spine slightly worn. (#110337)900:- Cazotte, Jacques Oeuvres badines et morales, historiques et philosophiques.. Première édition complète. Bastien, Paris 1816 (vol 1-3) and 1817 (vol. 4). 2. Portrait, (6),cxlviii,400 pages + 8 plates and 1 music sheet. 2. (4),554,(2) pages + 2 plates. 3. (4),582 pages + one table (upsid-down). 4. (4),580 pages + 7 plates. 4 contemporary (?), sligtly worn full leather bindings. Former owners name on title-page of vol. 1-3. 2 pages with small ink-spots in vol. 2. Book-plates (eagle under crown). (#210021)4800:- (bild) Chomel, Noel Huishoudelyk Woordboek 1-2.. Leyden & Amsterdam 1743. Frontispiece, (6), 1-616, (2), 617-1496 pages + 75 (of 81) plates. Bound in 2 contemporary full leather volumes with richley gilded spines. Vol. 1 with 5 cm cracked hinge and small (repairable) damage near foot of spine. Interior very good, only a few leaves and plates with very little foxing. Plates 4, 38, 49, 57, 59 and 61 are missing. (#130349)3500:- Cobbett, William Advice to Young Men. and (Incidentally) to Young Women. In the Middle and Higher Ranks of Life in a Series of Letters Adressed to a Youth, a Bachelor, a Lover, a Husband, a Father, and a Citizen or a Subject. Oxford 1980. 335 pages. Original cloth with dustjacket. (#152629)140:- d'Arnaud, [François Thomas Marie de Baculard], Épreuves du sentiment 1-6.. Paris, Moutard 1781-82. Engraved frontespiece, xxii,(2),360,(2) + (2),418,(2) + (2),528,(2) + (2),510,(2),xii + (2),418 + (2),618,(2) pages. 8:vo. In 6 contemporary full leather (calf) bindings. Volume 6 with damages at top and lower part of spine. (#200503)2000:- (bild) de Genlis, Madame Les annales de la vertu, ou Histoire universelle, iconographique et Littéraire,. A l'usage des artistes et des jeunes Littérateurs, et pour servir à l'éducation de la jeunesse. Tome 1-2 + 5. Nouvelle édition, Paris, chez Maradan, libraire 1811. xxii,395 + 456 + 405 pages. Uncut in original pink wrappers. Front wrapper of vol. 1 damaged. 3 volumes. Part 1-2 and 4 of 5. (#185663)450:- de Mersan, M. Manuel de chasseur,. Contenant un Traité sur toute espèce de Chasses; un Vocabulaire des termes de Vénerie, de Fauconnierie et de Chasse; le précis des Lois, Ordonnances, Réglemens, etc le port d'Armes, la Chasse, etc. Quatrième édition, Revue, considérablement augmentée, et ornée de figures et musique, par un ancien canonnier a cheval retiré en poitou. Paris 1828. (4), 260 pages + 16 pages music and 36 pages advertisments and 2 folding plates. 12:mo. Uncut, in printed original wrappers, as published. Very fine. (#153165)1000:- Desmaizeaux, Pierre (editor) Recueil de diverses pièces, sur la philosophie, la religion naturelle, l'histoire, les mathematiques, &c. Par Mrs. Leibniz, Clarke, Newton, & autres auteurs célèbres I-II.. Seconde edition, revue, corrigée & augmentée. Amsterdam, Francois Changuion 1740. 2 engraved frontespieces. (22),xxix-cii,(2),429,(1) + (6),550 pages. 12:mo. Contemporary full leather bindings with gilt spines. Interior clean. A very fine copy According to other copies I have investigated this is complete. There is no pages between the 22 not numbered pages and "Preface" that starts with page xxix. (#200075)3850:- (bild) Dinckel, M. John Poetic Calendar,. or Book of Instruction, Opening the Pathway of Investigation of Seasons or Days, Indicated by Poets by means of the risings and settings of conspicuous stars; and disclosing the method or art, bt which in our age any day that poets propose to describe may be indicated by the rising and setting of some star; illustrated by examples of almost all days, collected from ancient and more modern poets, and from the poems of other versifiers. 1580. Translated by Robert Belle Burke. Diss. Philadelphia 1925. 76 pages. Softcover. Stamped. Text in Latin with English translation of January only. (#111512)200:- Fenelon, Francois de Salignac de la Mothe Die seltsame Begebenheiten des Telemach, In einem auf die wahre Sitten- und Staats-Lehre gegründeten, angenehmen und sinnreichen Helden-Gedichte durch den Herrn von Fenelon abgefaßt.. Mit nöthigen Anmerckungen erläutert, und ins Teutsch übersetzt von Ludwig Ernst von Faramond. Mit 25. Kupfern und einer Land-Charte gezieret. Franckfurt und Leipzig, Peter Conrad Monath 1736. (30),864 pages + folding map and 24 engraved plates. Wotm contemporary full leather binding. One plate woth stain. This copy has 24 engraved plates but on title-page is mentioned 25 plates. There is one plate for every book, so maybee there schould be a frontespiece? (#200100)2500:- (bild) Forester, Frank The compleat manual for young sportsmen: with directions for handling the gun, the rifle and the rod; the art of shooting on the wing; the breaking, management and hunting of the dog; the varieties and habits of game; river,lake, and sea fishing, etc., etc., etc.. New York, W.A. Townsend 1864. XVI,482,6 pages + Extra lihographed title and 2 plates. Original decorated cloth. Slightly foxed plates. (#195846)550:- Formey, [Jean Henri Samuel] Anti-Emile.. Nouvelle edition, corrigée et augmentée. Berlin, Joachim Pauli 1763. (8), 254, (2) pages. Uncut, in gray wrappers, as published. Spine slightly worn. Former owners' names on inside of front wrapper. A few small brown stains. Second edition. First edition was published the same year. (#153204)3000:- Fourier, Charles The Passions of the Human Soul II.. Translated from the french by the Rev. John Reynell Morell. With critical annotations, a biography of Fourier, and a general introduction by Hugh Doherty. Vol. II. London Hippolyte Bailliere 1851. (12),463 pages. Original brown decorated cloth. Very fine. Part 2 only. (#179786)900:- Frederic II Oeuvres de Frédéric II, Roi de Prusse 1-4.. Publiées du vivant de l'auteur, Berlin, Voss, Decker, Treuttel 1789. (4),xx,439,(1) + (2),xiv,400 + (2),458,(4) + (2),409,(5) pages + 13 plates (in vol. 3). Contemporary worn half leather. Interior with a few small brown spots. 4 volumes. (#220666)1200:- Gordon, Pryse Lockhart Personal Memoirs; or Reminicences of Men and Manners at Home and Abroad, During the Last Half Century.. With occasional sketches of the author's life. In two volumes. London Henry Colburn and Richard Bentley 1830. xii,456 + viii,451,(2) pages. Ex library copy in later cloth bindings. 2 volumes. (#182483)800:- Graffman, C.S. Skottska vuer.. Tecknade efter Naturen under en resa i Skottland. Lithografierade af C.J. Billmark. Tryckte hos Gjöthström & Magnusson, Stockholm 1832-33. Graverad titel + 24 sidor text och 24 planscher samt subscriptionsförteckning. Folio. I ett nött klotryggsband. Inlagan lagerfläckad. De sista bladen lösa. plansch 2 med reva. Scottish views, lithographed by the famous C.J. Billmark. 24 pages text (in Swedish) and 24 lithographed plates in folio. Worn half cloth. Interior foxed. One plate torn 2 cm into the picture without loss of paper. Last leaves loose. (#213373)500:- (bild) Guillimann, François Francisci Guillimanni De episcopis Argentinensibus liber commentarius in quo super episcoparum seriem, gesta, & quamplurium veras genealogias : opidorum, urbium, in primis amplissimae civitatis Argentinae, itemae monasteriorum, collegiorum, aliorum locorum sacrorum episcopatus, orines, incrementa, conversiones. Friburgi Brisgoiae, apud Josephum Langium (Josph Lang) 1608. (8),463,(1 blank) pages 4:o. Together with: Antonio Cervera de La Torre, De felici excessu Philippi II. Austriaci Hispaniarum regis libri III.....Theutonici ordinis Principis Franciscus Guillimannus. Friburgi Brisgoiae, Joseph Lang 1609. (8),1-116, 115-155,(3 blank) pages. 4:o. Bound together i contemporary vellum. A few small brown spots (#209786)3000:- (bild) Harland, Marion Common Sense in the Houshold. A Manual of Practical Housewifery.. New York 1876. (9), 14-556, (2) pages. Old (original) cloth. The book has been wrapped in newspaper, and some of it still sticks to the binding. Interior good. (#85801)500:- (bild) Histoire de l'Academie Royale des Inscriptions et Belles Lettres I-XLIII.. (Later Mémoires de littérature tirés des registres de l'Academie Royale des Inscriptions et Belles-Lettres.) Tome premiere, 1717 - tome quarante-troisième, 1786. Every second volume of the first 15 with engraved frontespiece. 269 plates, maps and plans + 2 tables. Volume 1-15 + 40-41 bound in full leather with slightly worn surfaces, 16-39 + 42-43 uncut in original blue hard covers, some with loss of paper on the surface of the boards. Last volume with worn spine. Interior very clean. No foxing or other spots. All volumes tight and solid. Former owners stamps. 43 volumes. (#189433)28000:- (bild) Hubbard, Elbert Elbert Hubbard's Scrap Book.. Containing the inspired and inspiring selections gathered during a life time of discriminating reading for his own use. Printed and made into a book by the Roycrofters ... New York City 1923. 228 pages + indexes. 4:o. Original ribbon binding. Name on fly-leafe, otherwise a very fine copy. (#187538)450:- (bild) Hästläkaren (ryggtitel) 1-2.. Innehåller: 1. Abildgaard, Häst- och boskaps-läkaren .... Öfwersat tillika med anmärkningar af A.H. Florman. 2:a uppl. Lund 1798. 146, (2) sid. 2. Florman, Inledning til Hästars Kännedom ... Lund 1794. (6), 166, (4) sid. 3. Sven Samuelsson, Den förträffeliga och tilförlåteliga Häste-boken, ... Fjerde upl. Link. 1799. (4), 184 sid. 4. Claës G. Bure, Afhandling om Hästars Ans, Föda och Allmännaste Sjukdomar. Strängnäs 1801. (2), 92, (2) sid. 5. Leopold von Hartman, Afhandling om några allmänna sjukdomar hos hästar, ... Sth 1801. 40 sid. 6. C.F. Weber, Om Häst-Hofwens Bestånds delar och Dess nytta. Jämte det bästa och naturligaste skoningssättet. Öfwersatt och tilökt af Petr. Hernquist. Sth 1781. 56, (2) sid. 7. Carl Hagel, ... Botemedel för Sjukdomar och Skador hos Hästar. Sth 1792. 45, (3) sid. 8. J.B. von Sind, Den uti Fält och på Resa Hastigt Helande Häst-Läkaren, ... Öfwersatt. Sth 1774. (16), 240 sid. + utvikbar plansch. Inbundna i 2 trevliga halvfranska band från tidigt 1800-tal, varav en med lite skadad rygg. Vikta hörn. Något "lagerfläckad" och nätt skuren. (#25727)3400:- Jesus! Der getreueste Gefehrte u. Helfer, zu Wasser und Lande, darinnen enthalten: Morgen- Abend- Buß- Beicht- Communion-Reise- nebst andern Gebeten und Liedern; Allerhand Rechentafeln, Resolvir- und Zinßrechnung, Gewichts- Münz- und Maaßvergleichung; ingleichen Wegweiser, Landcharte, Städte- oder Meilen- Sonnenzeiger, Wind- und Seecompaß, immerwährenden Calender, und andern nützlichen Nachrichten;. Mit Kupfern. Waldenburg, Hodmann o.J (c. 1750) Engraved frontespiece, (6),135,(1),252 pages + folding map of Germanu (coloured), large folding engraving (Neuer Milien- und Staedtetafel), engr. folding plate ( Globus terrestris) + engraving (hands and town-view). 16:mo. Contemporary leather with clasp. Worn spine. Neuvermehret Punctir-Kunst ... 24 pages is not present in this copy. There is a blank page, page 197, maybee there is supposed to be something pasted in there. (#204819)800:- (bild) Katz, Blanche La Prise d'Orenge. according to MS. A1 Bibliothèque Nationale Française 774 including excerpts, published for the first time, from MSS. B1, C, D, and E, and variants from MSS. A2, A3, A4, and B2; with Introduction, Table of Assonances, Glossary and Table of Proper Names by Blanche Katz. Diss. New York 1947. XXXV, 209 pages + plates. Softcover. Stamped. (#95589)200:- Le Guat, François ; Michael Rohrlach Erben Book Der Frantzösische Robinson, Oder Franc. Lag?et [!] Eines gebohrnen Frantzosens/ Warhafftige Beschreibung seiner Reisen und wunderlichen Begegenheiten nach zweyen unbewohnten Ost-Indischen Insuln : Nebst Einer Erzehlung der merck-würdigsten Dinge/ die sie auf der Insul Mauritii, zu Batavia, an dem Cap der guten Hoffnung, auf der Insul S. Helena und andern Orthen worauf Sie zukommen/ angemercket haben ; Mit Land-Carten und Figuren versehen (1723). Frankfurt am Main 1723(?). (28),400,(32) pages + 25 (of 29) engraved plates and 2 (of 4) engraved folding maps. Worn contemporary full leather. Frontespiece, title-page 3 illustrations and 2 maps are missing + 28 leaves and 5 folding leafs at the end. (#204865)1000:- (bild) Lorimer, George Horace Letters from A Self-Made Merchant To His Son.. Being the letters written by John Graham, head of the House of Graham & Company, pork-packers in Chicago, familiary known on Change as " Old Gorgon Graham", to his son, Pierrepont, facetiously known to his intimates as "Piggy". With a new introduction by Lawrence Grauman, jr. and Robert S. Fogarty. New York 1970. xxxiv,312 pages. Original cloth in dust jacket. Originally published in 1901. (#181493)150:- Luce - Essays Offered to G.H. Luce. by His Colleagues and Friends in Honour of His Seventy-Fifth Birthday. Edited by Ba Shin and others. Volume I-II. Ascona 1966. XVI, 244 + (8), 190 pages + plates. 4:o. Bound with wrappers in one cloth volume. Very fine copy. (#65554)1000:- Machiavelli, Niccolò Oeuvres de Machiavel 1-8.. Nouvelle édition. Contenant le premiere Livre des Discours Politiques sur la premiere Décade de Tite-Live. Paris, Volland 1793. (4),xii,xvi,331 + (4),viii,332 + (4),vi,272xxviii,306 + (2),302 + (4),331 + (4),210 + (6),lxxvi,296 pages + 5 folding tables. Bound in 8 contemporary half leather bindings. Volume 2 with small damage on top of spine, otherwise a very fine set, clean and solid. (#190111)2800:- Magill, Walter H., The Determination of the Graphic Forms and the Frequencies of the Forms Employed in the Current Reading Matter of the Non-Specialist.. Dissertation, Philadelphia 1930. 61 pages + 13 plates and 2 large folding diagrams. Soft covers. Small stamp on front cover. Very fine. First edition. (#205780)300:- Marmontel Belisarius. and Numa Pompilius by Florian. With Biographical introduction. London, Walker 1811. Engraved front and extra engraved title, xii,1-166 + 169-395,(3) pages. 12:mo. Contemporary full calf with slightly worn surface. On page between the 2 works missing, either a blank or a title. (#180533)250:- Marmontel, Jean-François Contes moraux. Tome I-II of 3.. Portrait, 2 engraved titles, 7 (of 9) + 9 plates by Gravelot. Paris, J. Merlin 1765. (4), XVI, 346; (4), 376; pages. Contemporary worn full leather (calf), Interior slightly foxed and a few pages and plates waterstained Part 1 and 2 of 3. Volume 3 missing. The first edition appeard in 1761 in 2 volumes. This is the first with the beautiful illustrations by Gravelot. (#202977)500:- (bild) Mase, Darrel J. Etiology of Articulatory Speech Deffects.. A Comparison of the Incidence of Six Selected Factors in Children Having Articulatory Speech Deffects with the Incidence of the Same Factors in Children Not Having Speech Deffects. Diss. New York 1946. 85 pages. Softcover. Stamped. (#124558)100:- Montesquieu, Charles Louis de Secondant De l'esprit des loix.. Ou du rapport que les loix doivent avoir avec la constitution de chaque gouvernement, les moeurs, le climat, la religion, le commerce, &c. Nouvelle edition. Revüe & corrigée, avec des changements considérables donnés par l'Auteur. Tome I-III. Geneve, Barrillot & Fils 1753. (2),xxiv,(2),356 + (2),xvi,(2),358,(2) + (2),v-xvi,(2)442 pages, 8:vo. In 3 contemporary full leather bindings intact but slightly worn surface. Interior very fine, a few pages with small spots and page 1-24 in volume 3 with small water-stain in margin. All free front end-papers with part cut out. The 2 missing leaves in the beginning of volume 3 is a mystery. The "Table" is complete, and in the other volumes there is nothing els but the "table" (#190247)4000:- Moulidars, T. de Un million de jeux et de plaisirs. Bibliothèque universelle des divertissements et des exercices de l'esprit et du corps, à l'usage de la maison, des jardins et du plein air; distractions de tous les âges; récréations scientifiques; physique amusante; jeux anciens et nouveaux; de calcul, d'adresse, de hasard et de société. Ouvrage illustré de 750 belles figures. Paris, Librairie contemporaine No date (1880). xvi,796 pages. Original red decorated cloth. (#199802)700:- Perrault, Charles Les hommes illustres qui ont paru en France pendant le XVII. siècle.. Troisième édition revue, corrigée et augmentée. Paris, Antoine Dezallier, 1701. (14),220.(4) + 224,(2) pages. 8:vo. Together with: Charles Patin, Relations historiques et curieuses de voyages, en Allemagne, Angleterre, Hollande, Bohême, Suisse, &c. (6),271 pages + frontespiece, Portrait, map and 5 plates (2 folding). Amsterdam, Pierre Mortimer 1695. 12:mo. Bound together i contemporary? vellum. 2 leaves in the second work with small spot. (#201609)5000:- (bild) [Praetorius, Johann Philipp] Zeit-Vertreib bei müßigen Stunden,. Das ist Eilf mahl Eilf sinnreiche, merckwürdige und Lustige Gegen-Reden, Begenenheiten und Einfälle, zu vergönter Gemüths-Ergetzung, übersetzt und zusamen getragen von Hilario Sittenfreund. Erster Theil (alles erschienen?). Freudenthal, Fröhlich 1743. (16), 294 pages. In old and worn marbled stiff wrappers. Firs 4 leaves torn in margin, affecting the text, next 4 leaves with part of margin missing, not affecting the text. A not very fine copy of a rare book, well worth restoring. (#139642)1500:- Propiac, Chevalier de, Les Curiosités Universelles , faisant suite aux Merveilles du Monde contenant Les plus beaux ouvrages de la nature et des Hommes, répandus sur toute la surface e la Terre; ouvrage destinés et à l'amusement de la jeunesse et orné de gravures I-II.. 10 engraved plates incl. the 2 fronespieces. Paris, Eymery 1823. viii,375 + (4),377 pages + 10 plates. Uncut in original blue wrappers. 4 leaves with small brown spot and one leave vith 5 cm tear without loss of paper. 2 volumes. (#202953)600:- (bild) Racine, Jean Oeuvres de Jean Racine 1-5 + 6 (of 7) Oeuvres diverses de J. Racin.. Avec des Commentaires par M. Luneau de Boisjermain. Paris Louis Cellot 1769 (1-5) and Londres 1769 (6). cxxii,(2),223,(3) + 372 + 333,(3) + 360,(3) + 360 + viii,346 pages + portait and 12 engraved plates. In 6 full leather bindings with gilt spines. Volume 7 (Oeuvres diverses) was published, not present in this set. (#205388)1200:- (bild) Revue commerciale, maritime, etc.. Ou Annales du commerce. Ire Année. N°. 1 - 2me Année, N°. 7. Février 1828 - Juillet 1829. 495 + 280 pages. Bound in contemporary damaged half leather binding. Partly foxed. I have nat been able to establish if this is all published or not. The journal seems to be very rare. (#155218)1850:- Rousseau, Jean Jacques Discours sur l'origine et les fondemens de l'inegalité parmis les hommes.. Amsterdam, Marc Michel Rey, 1855. lxx,(2),262,(2) pages (frontespiece missing). Together with: Stanislas Boufflers, Discours sur la vertu. Deuxième édition, corrigée et augmentée. Paris An IX - 1800. 71,(3) pages. Togeter with: Stanislas Boufflers, Discours sur la littérature, prononcé a l'Académie de Siences et des Belles-Lettres de Berlin, le 9 aout 1798. Paris, An VIII. (1800). (2),77,(1) pages. Bound in worn but solid half leather. One page with a spot. Title-page with former owners names and a spot. (#190114)1450:- Rousseau, Jean-Jacques Oeuvres de J. J. Rousseau, Citoyen de Genève.. Edition ornée de superbes Figures d'après les tableaux et dessins de Cochin, Vincent, Regnault et Monsiau. Paris, Defer de Maisonneuve, Imprimerie de Didot le jeune, 1793-1797. Paris, Defer de Maisonneuve, Imprimerie de Didot le jeune, 1793-1797.olume 1, 3-15, 17-18. Folio. Contemporary worn half leather with cracked hinges. One voume with defect spine. Some foxing. Volume 2 (= part one of Heloise) and 16 (part 2 of Correponence) are missing. (#200191)5000:- (bild) Samlingsband.. 1. [Carl Hårleman], Dag-bok öwfer en ifrån Stockholm igenom åtskillige rikets landskaper gjord resa, år 1749. Stockholm, Salvius 1749. 106 sidor + en plansch. 2. Fortsättning af samma Dag-bok och resebeskrifning, utgiven av H.H. Liewen? Stockholm, Salvius 1753. (10),34 sidor + 2 kartor och en plansch. 3. Johan Fischerström, Påminnelser wid Sweriges allmänna och enskylta hushållning. Stockholm, Grefing 1761. 184 sidor. 4. Sven Lagerlöf, Wälmente tanckar om dessa tiders stadeliga öfwerflödighet i kläder och hushåldning, yttrade för Det lofliga Borgare Ståndets samtlige herrar fullmägtige, på Stockholms rådhus den 4. Februarii 1714. Å nyo uplagdt, Stockholm, Salvius 1745. 48 sidor. 5. Anders af Botin, Tankar, om yppighet och öfwerflöd, lämpade till närwarande tider. Stockholm i Maji månad 1765. Salvius utan år (1765). 110 sidor. Inbundna i ett välbevarat samtida halvfranskt band med ryggtitel: Tractater om hushållningen. Handskriven innehållsförteckning på främre pärmens insida och försättsbladet. Arbete 1 saknar ett blankt blad i slutet. Arbete 2 har inget titelblad, vilket ej heller KB:s ex har. Arbete 3 något hårt skuren. (#205699)7000:- (bild) Short, Thomas, Dissertation upon Tea, Explaining its Nature and Properties By many New Experiments; .... To which is added the Natural History of Tea ... London, W. Bowyer for Fletcher Gyles 1730. (4),119,(1) pages. 4:o. Later half cloth. Last leaf wrinkled. First edition. (#201566)20000:- (bild) Skoog - Festskrift.. On the Occasion of His 60th Anniversary These Papers are Dedicated, with Admiration and Gratitude to Professor Torsten Skoog by his Colleagues and Pupils. Edited by Carl-Axel Hamberger and others. Uppsala 1954. 303 pages. Original half cloth. (#86096)225:- [Sticotti, Antoine-Fabio] Dictionnaire des gens du monde.. Historique, Littéraire, Critique, Moral, Physique, Militaire, Politique, Caractéristique & Social: ... Nouvelle édition. Paris, J.P. Costard 1773. (2), viii, 637, (1) + (2), 543, (1) + 516 + (2), 567, (1) + (2), 756, (2) pages. 8:vo. Contemporary half leather, slightly worn at head of spines. 5 volumes. (#140465)1850:- Stidley, Leonard Albert Sectarian Welfare Federation among Protestants.. A Comparative Study of the Protestant, Jewish and Roman Catholic Welfare Federations, with an Especial Emphasis upon the Federation of Protestant Welfare Agencies, Incorporated, of New York City. Diss. New York 1944. XVI, 159 pages. Softcover. Stamped. (#106797)300:- Stockholms Mode-Journal.. Tidskrift för den eleganta verlden. Tredje årgången 1945, nr 1, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 och 11. Med 11 kolorerade modeplanscher. 4:o. Inbundna i ett halvfranskt band utan rygg. (#157027)600:- Storck, John Man and Civilization.. An Inquiry into the Bases of Contemporary Life. 3rd edition.
